# Screenshots Directory

This directory contains automated test screenshots and archived manual testing images.

## Structure

```
screenshots/
├── AUTOMATED-TESTS/    # Active: Generated by automated test suite
├── archive/            # Historical: Old manual test screenshots
└── README.md           # This file
```

## Directory Details

### `AUTOMATED-TESTS/`
**Active automated test outputs** - generated by `tests/automated/game-scene-layout.test.js`

**Viewport Coverage:**
- iphone14-pro-max-portrait (430×932)
- iphone14-pro-max-landscape (932×430)
- galaxy-s20-ultra-portrait (412×915)
- galaxy-s20-ultra-landscape (915×412)
- iphone-se-portrait (375×667)
- iphone-se-landscape (667×375)
- mid-width-portrait-500 (500×800)
- mid-width-portrait-600 (600×900)
- ipad-portrait (768×1024)
- ipad-landscape (1024×768)
- desktop (1920×1080)

**How to generate:**
```bash
node tests/automated/game-scene-layout.test.js
```

**Purpose:** Visual verification of responsive layout across all device sizes. Updated automatically during testing iterations (~30 seconds for full suite).

### `archive/`
**Historical screenshots** from manual testing sessions.

- `2026-02-15-manual-testing/SCREENS-01/` - Manual screenshots documenting pre-fix layout issues
  - 26 screenshots showing problems: rotation issues, grid cutoff, text overlap, etc.
  - **Historical value:** Documents the responsive layout problems we solved in v0.2.0

**Purpose:** Preserve evidence of issues for future reference. Not used in active testing.

---

## Maintenance

- **AUTOMATED-TESTS/** is overwritten on each test run - no manual edits needed
- **archive/** is read-only - preserve for historical reference
- When archiving new manual screenshots, use date-based folder naming: `YYYY-MM-DD-description`

---

**Last Updated:** 2026-02-15
**Active Test Suite:** tests/automated/game-scene-layout.test.js
